title: Simultaneous Machine Translation for Speech Recognition and Synthesis

This list focuses on articles exploring the intersection of speech recognition, synthesis, and simultaneous machine translation. It includes research papers, surveys, and relevant articles published before
- A comprehensive overview of speech translation research, including challenges and future directions
**"Acoustic Modeling for Speech Translation"** by Shinji Watanabe, et al
- Discusses acoustic modeling techniques for speech translation, focusing on deep learning approaches

title: - Explores end-to-end models for speech translation, eliminating the need for separate recognition and translation steps
